name: Graknork
movement: 50 ft. walking speed and 30 ft. swimming speed
description: Graknork is a massive, formidable monstrosity with sharp claws and a powerful bite, capable of swift movement through both land and water.
memorable: It can unleash an icy beam that restrains its targets, combined with devastating melee attacks, making it a strong threat in battle.
goals: To dominate its environment through raw strength and powerful icy attacks against foes.
relations: May be encountered alongside other monstrous creatures in cold regions or deep waters.
environment: Commonly found in cold waters or icy terrains.
strengths: Exceptional physical capabilities, solid defenses, and a variety of powerful attacks.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma, making it vulnerable to manipulation.
attacks: Graknork can perform a multiattack that includes a powerful bite and claw attacks, as well as a freezing eye ray that can immobilize enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Freezing Eye, which can deal substantial cold damage and restrain targets in a broad line.
senses: Graknork has keen sight, giving it an advantage on perception checks that rely on sight.
skills: It possesses a high perception skill, allowing it to notice its environment effectively.
additional_information: Resistances against non-magical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing
Ability to knock creatures prone with successful claw attacks
Can unleash its special ability to freeze enemies in place, altering battle dynamics
Vulnerable to effects that target intelligence or charisma
test_queries: gargantuan icy monstrosity with freezing attacks
powerful melee monster that swims fast
monster that restrains enemies with ice beam
large monster with sharp claws and icy breath
